title: Trans
creator_contributor_role: Bachelor of Arts (Animation & Interactive Media), RMIT University, production facilities
abstract: A computer animated interpretation of a chain reaction
description: A seed pod blown from a tree lands on a rural powerline. The resulting spark starts a chain reaction, and a power surge travels 'upstream' towards the city grid. 'Trans' is an interpretation of the butterfly effect, how a tiny event can help to change things on a much larger scale. Music soundtrack by Gareth Burnell, Luke Hales and Adam Swain.
